alert.note: Alert for Fairfield (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 27 at 3:30PM EDT until August 27 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Fairfield County in central South Carolina... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 330 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Blackstock, or 9 miles north of Winnsboro, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Blackstock, White Oak, Fairfield Elementary School, Lebanon Fire Station, Feasterville Fire Station, and Fairfield County Detention Center. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
